name: Private Sidecar Tours
description:
If you have minimal experience driving scooters then why not take a private sidecar tour.
Sidecars are amazing as they fit 3 people on them comfortably. Take the tour together with your partner, your son or daughter, or a friend. Ofcourse you can take the tour by yourself also.
You have all the great experiences of our scooters tours, but without the worry of having to drive your own scooter.
The sidecar with motorbike attached are very large and comfortable, not to mention very unique. They attract a huge amount of attention on the road, so be sure to bring your cameras!
